title: A Simple Favor Sequel Lands Release Date on Prime Video
description: Prime Video has a favor to ask: Save the date for Another Simple Favor. The sequel to A Simple Favor starring Blake Lively and Anna Kendrick will premiere Thursday, May 1 on the streamer, Amazon announced on Tuesday. The film will also have its world premiere on opening night of the South by Southwest film […]
author: Michael Ausiello

title: 9-1-1: Lone Star’s Rob Lowe Pitched a Much Darker Series Finale Ending
description: If you enjoyed the happy, full-circle ending of 9-1-1: Lone Star‘s series finale, you have Rob Lowe to not thank for it. If the star and executive producer had his way, the Fox procedural would have ended on a very different, much darker note. As it is, the finale ended with Lowe’s character, Captain Owen […]
author: Andy Swift

title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Can Little House on the Prairie and Other Classic Shows Be Rebooted Without Rewriting History?
description: The latest reboot — of treasured children's classic Little House on the Prairie — has sparked debate. What's your take on revisiting classic TV? The post Can Little House on the Prairie and Other Classic Shows Be Rebooted Without Rewriting History? appeared first on TV Fanatic.

title: What the Sony-CBS Legal War Means for Jeopardy! and Wheel of Fortune
description: Jeopardy! and Wheel of Fortune are in the headlines because of a bitter legal battle between CBS and Sony. Will both shows be pulled? The post What the Sony-CBS Legal War Means for Jeopardy! and Wheel of Fortune appeared first on TV Fanatic.
